title: Schema of CMS application configuration
description: Schema used to indicate the configuration to the CMS when the application is loaded by it

assetsFolder.description: The relative path to the assets folder to import

localisationsFolder.description: The relative path to the localizations (.json files) folder to import

placeholderCssFiles.description: An array of the CSS files which are used by placeholders at runtime. These files will be used in the placeholder editor

defaultLanguage.description: The language code present in the localisation.metadata.json file

functionalContentsFolder.description: The relative path to the functional contents metadata folder to import

features.description: Set of additional CMS features that can be activated or deactivated for the application

themingCssOverrideEnabled.description: Specifies that the blueprint supports theming CSS file customization

themingCssVariablesEnabled.description: Specifies that the blueprint supports theming CSS variables customization

ruleFunctionalContentActionEnabled.description: Enables the custom rule action of type 'functional content update' (UPDATE_FUNCTIONAL_CONTENT). Should be enabled only if the application implements this custom action type

rulesetMultiscopeSupportEnabled.description: Enables multi scope components on rulesets. Should be enabled only if the otter version used by the application supports this feature

migrationScriptFolder.description: The relative path to the migration scripts

migrationScriptVersionDependency.description: Name of the package dependency to get the current blueprint version from. If the dependency is not found, the field version in the package.json will be used instead if defined. If not defined, no migration script will be executed
